attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the electorate demand the dismissal of Michael Martin as Speaker of the House of Commons of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland Assembled having shown ultimate contempt for the electorate's disgust at the actions of various MPs in vexatious overclaimIng of second home expenses, tax avoidance and profiteering on the sale of said second homes

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
